簡單 / 普通
[skull]：-1 (-3 instead if there are 4 or more unflooded [[Y'ha-nthlei]]地點s in play).

back_flavor: The waters continue to roil in ebullient energy, as if somehow alive. With each passing moment, the sea grows more and more volatile. Stranger still are the monstrous creatures that now prowl the dark waters - creatures that defy all laws of nature...
back_text: 將放在一邊的洛依高爾 enemy and the set-aside Aquatic Abomination enemy和遭遇棄牌堆一起混洗入遭遇牌堆。
flavor: Your boat lands on the black reef, and you descend once more into the tidal caverns. Deeper and deeper still you travel, until all thoughts of returning to the surface seem like fantasy.
name: Under the Surface
text: 強制 - 在你回合開始時，如果你在完全淹沒的地點，你奮力掙扎，求取空氣：在你回合結束時，如果你在自己回合期間沒有進入過未淹沒或部分淹沒的地點，受到5點直接傷害。

back_text: If Hydra is in play, flip her to her (Awakened and Enraged) side. If Dagon is in play and slumbering, flip him to his (Awakened and Enraged) side.
flavor: Even this deep beneath the surface of the ocean, you can tell that your time is running short. You feel the pull of the tide as it courses through the water. Every bone in your body quakes. The walls breathe as though alive.
name: Celestial Alignment
text: 強制 - 在你回合開始時，如果你在完全淹沒的地點，你奮力掙扎，求取空氣：在你回合結束時，如果你在自己回合期間沒有進入過未淹沒或部分淹沒的地點，受到5點直接傷害。

back_flavor: The chanting of the Deep Ones rises to a crescendo. The alien walls of Y'ha-nthlei twist and contort before your eyes, like lungs desperately clawing for breath. The air becomes thin. Water seeps through the walls. Nothing can stop the pull of the tide now. Nothing can stop the great flood. A triumphant roar sounds throughout the city, and the citizens of the deep rise to meet the cry in their jubilance. You collapse in exhaustion and resignation. Your part is over, now. The part of humanity will soon follow.
flavor: The great flood has begun. With the ritual complete, the seas shall overtake the Earth, and there will be nothing left but the primordial ocean and its denizens. You are all that stands in the way of humanity's extinction.
name: The Flood
text: If an [[古神]]敵人 is slumbering, flip it to its (Awakened and Enraged) side. 強制 - 在你回合開始時，如果你在完全淹沒的地點，你奮力掙扎，求取空氣：在你回合結束時，如果你在自己回合期間沒有進入過未淹沒或部分淹沒的地點，受到5點直接傷害。

back_flavor: A maelstrom of currents tugs at your flesh as you cross through the gateway. When you emerge on the other side, you are no longer in the simple tidal caverns beneath Devil Reef, but inside a vast city within the depths: a city of otherworldly, alien architecture and, surprisingly, riches beyond your wildest imagination.
back_text: Remove each location other than Gateway to Y'ha-nthlei from the game (or add them to the victory display if they have 勝利X and no clues remaining)。Discard each card at those locations. 將set-aside locations into play as shown in the Campaign Guide, following the "Act 2 Setup" instructions. (Note that the number of Y'ha-nthlei locations used and the arrangement of the locations varies depending on the number of investigators in the game.) 將the set-aside Hydra enemy into play in the Lair of Hydra, (Deep in Slumber) side faceup. 將the set-aside Dagon enemy into play in the Lair of Dagon. Check Campaign Log. If Dagon has awakened, he enters play (Awakened and Enraged) side faceup. If Dagon still slumbers, he enters play (Deep in Slumber) side faceup.
flavor: Finally you reach the gateway to the final depths: a swirling vortex of otherworldly currents beyond which Y'ha-nthlei, the city of the Deep Ones, waits. Somehow, you must gain entrance...
name: Back into the Depths
text: 目標 - If 每位調查員 is at Gateway to Y'ha-nthlei and the investigators possess each of the following keys (blue, red, yellow, and green), you may choose to 推進場景。

back_flavor: The seas part with a roaring torrent. Chill air flows through the corridors of Y'ha-nthlei as it rises. When the stars look down upon its alien, emerald halls, something in the air changes. There is a sound like a snap and the hissing of air being pulled through the vacuum of space. 然後，like automobiles lurching to life, the Earth and the Moon begin to move once more.
back_text: Add this card to the victory display. - If there is another act card in play, you may choose to either continue playing in order to accomplish the objective on that act card, or proceed immediately to (→結局1) without fulfilling that objective. - If there are no other act cards in play, proceed to (→結局1)。 勝利2.
flavor: Deep within the city of Y'ha-nthlei, the Deep Ones are performing a ritual that will drown the Earth under the seas. The only way to counteract this ritual is to unveil the depths and expose the city to the sky.
name: City of the Deep (v. I)
text: [fast] Either remove 1 [per_investigator] damage from an [[古神]]敵人 at your location, or investigators at a [[Lair]]地點 spend 1 [per_investigator] clues, as a group: Decrease the flood level of any non-[[聖堂]]地點 in play 目標 - Stop the Deep Ones' ritual by draining the city. If each location in play is unflooded, 推進場景。

back_flavor: The gold and jewels hoarded in the vaults of the Deep Ones are too plentiful to count. There is no doubt in your mind: This is how the creatures - and by proxy, the 達貢密教 - were able to manipulate the people of Innsmouth and bring more into their fold. Even a few handfuls of such riches would be enough for one to live comfortably for the rest of their life. You and Agent Harper grab only the most valuable relics you can find, leaving the rest to sink with the remainder of the city. "We have submarines stationed off the coast. When we're done here, they'll blow this place apart," she explains.
back_text: Add this card to the victory display. - If there is another act card in play, you may choose to either continue playing in order to accomplish the objective on that act card, or proceed immediately to (→結局1) without fulfilling that objective. - If there are no other act cards in play, proceed to (→結局1)。 勝利2.
flavor: You've agreed to help Agent Harper complete her mission to find and bring back the vast wealth of Y'ha-nthlei. Who knows what the government will do with such riches...
name: City of the Deep (v. II)
text: 目標 - Recover the riches of the Deep Ones. If the Lair of Dagon, the Lair of Hydra, and the Vault of Riches with the purple key have no clues on them, 推進場景。

back_flavor: With the deities of the Deep Ones thrashing and howling in pain, sections of the city begin to collapse all around you. Hoping to use this to your advantage, you lure the creatures closer and closer to the vaults where their riches are held. The vast hoards of gold and jewels are no doubt how the creatures - and by proxy, the 達貢密教 - were able to manipulate the people of Innsmouth and bring more into their fold. You cannot let that ever happen again. One final blow sends one of the creatures staggering through the wall. The ceiling collapses, and a torrent of seawater follows. You escape just before you are caught inside.
back_text: Add this card to the victory display. - If there is another act card in play, you may choose to either continue playing in order to accomplish the objective on that act card, or proceed immediately to (→結局1) without fulfilling that objective. - If there are no other act cards in play, proceed to (→結局1)。 勝利2.
flavor: You refuse to be a pawn in the government's schemes. Even so, you don't wish Agent Harper to come to any harm. You tell her to escape while she can, and she slips away, cursing under her breath. Now you have a new goal - send the riches of Y'ha-nthlei into the depths so they can never again be used against humanity.
name: City of the Deep (v. III)
text: 目標 - Collapse the vault containing the Deep Ones' riches. If Dagon and Hydra each have at least 4 [per_investigator] damage on them, 推進場景。

back_flavor: 這裡的空氣寒冷刺骨，除了水滴在粗糙石面上的輕聲之外，萬籟俱寂。你打了個寒顫，繼續向前……
name: Dark Abyss
text: 強制 - After Dark Abyss is revealed: 從放在一邊正面朝下的鑰匙中隨機選擇1個，放到Dark Abyss上，不要查看。 強制 - After the last clue is discovered from Dark Abyss: Dark Abyss becomes fully flooded. 提升每個 地點的淹沒等級。location connected to Dark Abyss.

back_flavor: "Stupendous and unheard-of splendours await me below, and I shall seek them soon." - H. P. 洛夫克拉夫特，《印斯茅斯之影》
back_text: Gateway to Y'ha-nthlei enters play partially flooded (even while it is unrevealed).
flavor: The gateway to the city of the deep is a roiling vortex of seawater - a portal of currents beyond which lies Y'ha-nthlei, your final destination.

back_flavor: As you descend the familiar steps, something tugs at your memories. You've been here before, haven't you?
name: Lair of Dagon
text: Lair of Dagon gets -1 shroud for each [[聖堂]]地點 with a key on it. [fast] Check Campaign Log. If all 7 keys are on locations and the Order's ritual was disrupted: You dig deep into your memories to recall what happened the last time you were here. 閱讀劇本手冊的記憶閃回XIV in the Campaign Guide.

back_flavor: Amidst the sound of cascading waterfalls, the deep rumbling of something enormous stirring emanates from below. Each of the thing's breaths resounds throughout the city, shaking the walls, filling your heart with fear, and yet, calling to you.
name: Lair of Hydra
text:
Lair of Hydra gets -1 shroud for each [[聖堂]]地點 with a key on it.
[action] Place the black, purple, or white key on this location: Deal 3 damage to an [[古神]]敵人 that is not slumbering. (團隊每場遊戲限制一次。)

name: Dagon
text: Dagon is slumbering. He cannot attack or engage, and is immune to investigator actions and player card effects. 強制 - 當一輪結束時，if an investigator is in Lair of Dagon and Dagon is ready: 放置1個毀滅標記 on him. [action]：檢定[willpower](4)。如果你檢定成功，either exhaust Dagon or remove 1 doom from him. 如果你檢定失敗 by 3 or more, 放置1個毀滅標記 on him.

name: Dagon
text: 獵手。龐大。反擊。 Dagon gets -1 fight for each [[聖堂]]地點 with a key on it. 強制 - After Dagon is evaded or dealt damage: Do the same to a copy of Dagon's Brood in play, as well.

name: Hydra
text: Hydra is slumbering. She cannot attack or engage, and is immune to investigator actions and player card effects. 強制 - 當一輪結束時，if an investigator is in Lair of Hydra and Hydra is ready: 放置1個毀滅標記 on her. [action]：檢定[willpower](4)。如果你檢定成功，either exhaust Hydra or remove 1 doom from her. 如果你檢定失敗 by 3 or more, 放置1個毀滅標記 on her.

name: Hydra
text: 獵手。龐大。反擊。 Hydra gets -1 fight for each [[聖堂]]地點 with a key on it. 強制 - After Hydra is evaded or dealt damage: Do the same to a copy of Hydra's Brood in play, as well.

name: Aquatic Abomination
text:
獵手。
While Aquatic Abomination is moving, fully flooded locations are considered to be connected to one another.
Aquatic Abomination cannot attack during the same phase it moved via its hunter keyword.

name: Dagon's Brood
text: 生成 - Lair of Dagon or Gateway to Y'ha-nthlei (whichever is farther from you). 獵手。 強制 - After Dagon's Brood與你交戰, if Dagon is in play: Either 放置1個毀滅標記 on Dagon, or Dagon attacks you.
traits: 類人. 怪物. 深潛者

traits: 類人. 怪物. 深潛者

name: Treacherous Depths
text: 禍害。 顯現 - You must either (choose one): - Increase the flood level of your current location. - Discard assets from your play area with a total resource cost of at least X，其中X為your location's shroud value.

name: Conspiracy of Deep Ones
text: 禍害。 顯現 - 檢定[willpower](2)。This test gets +1 difficulty for each [[聖堂]]地點 with a key on it. 如果你檢定失敗, you must either 放置1個毀滅標記 on the current agenda (this effect may cause the current agenda to advance), or the nearest [[古神]]敵人 in play attacks you.

name: Thalassophobia
text: 顯現 - If no investigators are at flooded locations, Thalassophobia 獲得湧動。 否則，每位調查員 at a partially flooded location takes 1點恐懼, and 每位調查員 at a fully flooded location takes 1 direct horror that cannot be prevented.

name: Diving Suit
text: You ignore the 強制 ability on the current agenda. 強制 - When any amount of damage would be placed on you: Place 1 of that damage on Diving Suit. 強制 - When Diving Suit leaves play: Remove it from the game.
